summary: Low air pollution forecast valid from Monday 10 January to end of Monday 10 January GMT
description: Monday is forecast to be similar to Sunday, dry with sunny intervals and temperatures around 10 degrees. <br/><br/>Surface pressure charts show a weak high pressure system establishing over central Europe on Monday. This is often associated with easterly wind and an import of pollution. Back-trajectories don't currently show any import airfeed. <br/><br/>Overall, air pollution is expected to remain 'Low' throughout the forecast period for the following pollutants:<br/><br/>Nitrogen Dioxide<br/>Ozone<br/>Sulphur Dioxide<br/>PM10 Particulates<br/>PM2.5 Particulates<br/><br/>
disclaimerText: This is for learning purpose and does not reflect real data source. See https://next.github.com/projects/flat-data for Flat Data Info
